name: Soup Simulator
description:
Short game made in under 48 hours for the 2021 paint jam.

How to play

-Move the knife with the mouse

-Slice through the target food (seen in the top left corner, changes each playthrough) to add to the soup and increase your points

-Try to make the target food land in the pot to get bonus points

-Dodge and avoid the other foods as they will lower your accuracy

-Once you lose all the accuracy points it is game over

Sound effects from freesfx
